pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Beetox 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors beetox triples the formation of collagen in 7 days leaving your skin looking brighter, firmer and visibly younger. 50ml.

Skin Doctors beetox triples the formation of collagen in 7 days. It helps to:Instantly activate your skin cells to reduce the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, sagging skin and ageingActively defies ageing with bee venom and manuka honeyLeave your skin looking brighter, firmer and visibly youngerNo bees were harmed in the extraction of been venom.Recommended for:All skin types. Caution bee allergiesAged skin as treatmentYounger skin as preventative - 35+

Size: 50ml

Ingredients

Key Ingredients:
Bee venom - It is a potent combination of enzymes, peptides and amino acids that works on all levels of the skin to encourage naturally occurring cell regeneration, boost collagen formation, accelerate the recovery of damaged skin cells and acts as a natural alternative to harsh antibiotic therapy for acne. It fights the signs of ageing when used cosmetically, as it fools the skin in to thinking it has been lightly stung with the compound melittin (peptide), therefore enhancing the stimulation the production of collagen and elastin.
Manuka Honey - Anti viral, anti bacterial, skin smoothing.
Trylagen - peptide for forming and building new collagen fibers.
Royal Jelly - high vitamin B and amino acid content.

All Ingredients:
Water, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Glyceryl Stearate, Butylene Glycol, Isopropyl Myristate, Dimethicone, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Menthyl Lactate, Pseudoalteromonas Ferment Extract, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Honey, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Royal Jelly Extract, Pseudoalteromonas Exopolysaccharides, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tripeptide-10 Citrulline, Bee Venom, Tripeptide-1, Phenyl Trimethicone, Caprylyl Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Lactic Acid, Sodium Salicylate, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Triethanolamine, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance.

Directions

Usage: Face, neck, décolletage. Avoid under the eye area.


Process: After cleansing with Skin Doctors™ pH balancing cleanser, massage a pea sized amount into face, neck and décolletage.


Best results: Use morning and night.
Use in conjunction with Skin Doctors™ SPF protection during the day and your choice of Skin Doctors™ moisturiser at night.
